text:
Mark Macias is a former Executive Producer with NBC, Senior Producer with CBS in New York and author of the book, Beat the Press: Your Guide to Managing the Media. You can reach him at [email protected]
The post How To Respond to Media Inquiries During a Crisis appeared first on PR News.
